overview: You're Busted, I'm Busty - Ava suspects her husband is cheating on her. Instead of confronting them, she decides to tell the mistresses husband Johnny.  1, 2, 3, Baby Cum On Me - Julia and Keiran have been married for a few years. But now, they want to spice up their sex life by bringing in a new friend.  Fallaciously Ever After - Veronica would like nothing more than to blow the lid off Isabella's affair for all the world to see! And when she finally does, Veronica seizes her opportunity with the love of her life, Alan, at long last!  Slut Wives - Johnny has 3 lovely, sexy wives. They all spend time together. After years of being together, the 3 ladies want to know who fucks best. The only way to judge, is to have a foursome and find out who the best slut wife really is...  Horny For The Help - Presley has become uncomfortable with Jessica's sexual advances. In attempts to smooth things out, Scott proposes that they all have dinner to get to know each other.
tagline: The hottest cheating wives for your enjoyment!
title: Real Wife Stories 12
